title: Two-wheeler makers ride high on record sales of branded spare parts
description: Royal Enfield, Bajaj Auto, and Hero MotoCorp saw record revenue in FY24 from branded parts and accessories sales, driven by a preference for branded spares. Revenue growth was boosted by premium models like Xpulse and Splendor motorcycles. Hero MotoCorp plans to expand its Global Parts Centre to capitalize on the growing market.
